name: Home page duplicating jobs
description: Jobs are duplicated across the three sections in the home page, rather than only appearing in their own category

name: Some jobs show the wrong "running since" date
description: Tony job ID1 has running since 01/1/1970

name: Navbar dropdown too close to edge of screen

name: Checkboxes and counters not reflecting initial data on jobtype update
description: The checkboxes and counters can show a default value instead of the value tied to a selected job type when updating

description: 500 error when attempting to update job types

name: Add time to running since on job page

description: Add some kind of default name to jobs, so that a new one doesn't have to be entered every time

name: Forgot Password functionality on login page
Show email address in signup email
Standardise button show rules
description: On home page, completed and failed jobs show the view all button even when empty, running jobs does not
